sentences.sContent: Again he drove the awl and needle into her.
sentences.sContent_eng: Again he drove the awl and needle into her.
sentences.sCn: 他便又一次掏出锥子和针，要扎她。

sentences.sContent: Baba Mustapha was seated with an awl in his hand, just going to work.
sentences.sContent_eng: Baba Mustapha was seated with an awl in his hand, just going to work.
sentences.sCn: 巴巴木沙发坐着手里拿着一个锥子，正在工作。

sentences.sContent: then his master must take him before the judges. He shall take him to the door or the doorpost and pierce his ear with an awl.
sentences.sContent_eng: then his master must take him before the judges. He shall take him to the door or the doorpost and pierce his ear with an awl.
sentences.sCn: 他的主人就要带他到审判官（或作：上帝；下同）那里，又要带他到门前，靠近门框，用锥子穿他的耳朵，他就永远服事主人。

trans.tranOther: a pointed tool for making holes in leather
